entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
